Review.Contenu: Stay away from these mfers. They are frauds and scammers. I had discrimination issues with them in the past and they take things personal and treat customers with disrespect and prejudice. I figure id give them another chance as I have two iphones for sale and I was quoted a price for bot on their site. I paid money to print out these shipping labels and packing slips. They people email me saying, sell them to someone else. That is fraud, discrimination, and disrespectful and terrible business. On top of that, they do not list a reason for it ! They have a lot of hate, anger, and prejudice and do not do business with Klymen and stay far away from them. On top of they, they low ball you with their offers and prey on people.

This was the response left on my precious review by this company: “The package arrived sealed but empty, we filed the claim with UPS and still waiting for their decision, unfortunately they are extremely slow. Our Terms and Conditions clear states that we are not responsible for lost or missing packages, or missing content” They are lying. I contact UPS and was told they were paid for the claim and the claim was closed. They never told me the package arrived and the box was empty. They have NOT communicated with me outside our last recorded phone conversation where Alex was extremely rude. They are scammer and they are lying. This is the response they left with the BBB: “We clear stated in our Terms and Conditions that we are not responsible for package or content loss. You accepted Terms and Conditions when you placed order.” No mention of them working with UPS on the claim or the box came empty. Please don’t waste your time and risk being scammed the way I did.Update: I didn’t send you an empty box. UPS scales don’t lie. I have proof of the weight of the package when it was shipped. You stole the phone and lied. Simple. Crooks. Pathetic.

I recently had to file a complaint with the Better Business Bureau on this company. I have sold  several phones with Klymen Electronics over the years. I sold them my phone and it became “lost” in the mail when it made it to Rochester, NY. I filed a claim with UPS and Klymen Electronics offered no support, but plenty of lies. They told me I should have purchased insurance when in fact I couldn’t because they were the “shipper” and a representative I spoke with from UPS stated they elected not to do so. I was told I could dispute the claim decision offered by UPS but Klymen Electronics would have to do so. I informed them if they and nothing. When I called and spoke with Alex I attempted to plea with him to do the right thing and compensate me for device or at least help me with the claim and he said “not my problem” I’ve done business with them for years, however customer loyalty means absolutely nothing to them as Alex told me “he didn’t care” he claimed any money UPS offered would be given to me however I spoke with UPS and they told me a check was mailed to them 3 weeks ago and of course they have been completely silent on the matter. I have emails and recorded conversations of my interactions with this company and how nasty they have been throughout this entire process. Please save yourself the headache of having to go through what I went through. I sold them a $1500 phone for $850 and ended up with absolutely nothing. I will never do business with them again.
Sent the phone in, got approval,have yet to receive a check.  Have communicated with customer service with limited response.

Review.Titre: I never got my check and customer…
Review.Contenu: I never got my check and customer service did nothing about it. But they have my ipad.

Beware of Unscrupulous Practices at Klyman.com, Prime Electronics LLC, and Klyman on Backmarket.com!I had an incredibly disappointing experience with Klyman.com. Their business practices are highly unscrupulous, and I strongly advise others to steer clear of this company.Initially, they entice you with a high offer for your phone if you ship it to them. However, once they receive the device, they resort to lowballing tactics and significantly reduce the offered price. It's a classic bait-and-switch scheme that leaves customers feeling cheated and taken advantage of.What's even more concerning is their false claims about the condition of the phone. Despite providing them with clear photographic evidence showing the excellent condition of my device, they insisted it was "strongly dented" as an excuse to further lower their offer. This level of dishonesty is unacceptable and shows a complete lack of integrity.Transparency, fairness, and honest business practices are essential when engaging in any transaction. Unfortunately, Klyman.com fails to meet these basic standards. I strongly caution against doing business with this company and recommend seeking alternative options for selling your phone, where you can be confident in receiving fair and honest treatment.Choose a reputable company that values its customers and conducts business with integrity. Klyman.com is certainly not one of them, especially through Backmarket.com and others. They also go by Prime Electronics LLC.

Review.Titre: I still have not received payment

Review.Contenu: Purchased a "refurbished" iPhone X from them on Overstock.com.  The only thing they did to refurbish the device was to slap a glass screen protector on a heavily scratched up display.  I was unaware of extent of the wear until I took the screen protector off because of a bubble in it.  They refuse to do the right thing to make this right.  Buyer beware.

Review.Titre: Check didn't show after 2 weeks, rude customer service.
Review.Contenu: Check didn't show after 2 weeks. Customer service was rude and sarcastic. I asked them why my check was delayed and their response was "Sometimes delays happen" followed up by "we ship via mail. Mail can be late, this is how USPS works" amongst other unhelpful comments. Do not recommend. Never received any money for my iPhone X that I "sold" them.

Review.Titre: Sent in my iPhone 6sin great shape and they said it would not power up
Review.Contenu: I sent in my iPhone 6s which was in great shape. When they received it they said it would not turn on even though I used it prior to sending it and put a 100% charge on it. So I told them to send it back and when I received it I immediately turned it on and it had a 100% charge. I am not sure what kind of operation this is but they sure don’t know what they are doing. I ended up selling it with no issues.

They gave me a price of $400 and when they received the phone they told me the back glass was cracked and they would now give me $250. I asked for a pic, which they sent. This is absolutely not how I sent my phone to them; impossible given my phone has never left its protective case. I would not do business with them again.

Review.Titre: Going on almost 2 1/2 weeks and a half and I…
Review.Contenu: Going on almost 2 1/2 weeks and a half and I still havent received my check, absolutely ridiculous. These people don’t even have the decency to call me, cancel that check and overnight a new one, then on top of that want to charge me 37.00 to do paypal and will take another 3 days, with all the technology we have, this is utterly atrocious and the sad part is they don’t give a damn.sell your phone with Declutter or another company, leave these disrespectful people alone, I’m contacting the consumer fraud protection bureau and attorney general

Review.Titre: No payment Over a month.Send me a fake check!
Review.Contenu: THIEF! They first send me a check for my items and I deposit it and it was returned. They send me a fake check and it cost me 19 dollar for a fake check return. They told me they will send another and cover the 19 dollar too, but been OVER a month and still no payment. Will make a complaint with BBB.Order #16179

I sent a 2-year-old ipad in pristine condition 3 weeks ago. I got no reply to my email a week ago, I decided to call. The man answering sounded like I woke him for a dead sleep and he mumbled something I could not understand. Red flag. He needed the case number, with my name he could do nothing. Red flag number 2. I checked with the post office, it had been sent. I have no tracking number because I was never given one. I am ripped off. This company sounds like a sleeping teenager by himself. And no, whoops, even the website is gone and the phone number as well.

Couldn’t print original shipping label and reached out to customer service for help - got NO response whatsoever.  Made a new order at what ended up being $40 less because the trade-in price had now gone down and never heard back from customer service.

Review.Titre: Company will try to steal your device
Review.Contenu: I sent my phone in they low balled me claiming it was scratched my phone was not scratched it is very new. Based on reviews I went with this company but don’t let the reviews fool you. Haven’t gotten a response from the company as of yet.

Poor customer service never answered my email! Do not believe what they said they answered the first and never the second and that was about my check! Poor customer service and harassment about why I left them this review!

Review.Titre: Warning to those with older phones!
Review.Contenu: Warning to those with older phones!They didn't tell me until a week after sending me a confirmation link (and after I sent a follow up email) that my phone was too old for them to send me packaging.

I received a offer of $700 for a new in the box iPhone 6 Plus S locked to AA&T with all accessories in original wrapping. I accepted the offer and shipped the phone. They only paid me $550, with zero explanation,

Review.Titre: The only offer for a 200 apple watch…
Review.Contenu: The only offer for a 200 apple watch was $10But its not like the entire screen is cracked its literally a small crack on the side of the screen

Review.Titre: GOD FORBID YOU HAVE TO RETURN!!!!!
Review.Contenu: I bought an iPad from Klymen. They were very prompt in shipping. Unfortunately the iPad I bought didn't work for the application i bought it for. It was returned and never used. Upon returning it through eBay store they wrote me saying it was dirty, and broken glass. It was packaged up in their original packaging and great care was used. It was not broken, it was not at all dirty so they ripped me on a refund arbitrarily gave me 95.00 on a 190.00 purchase. No pictures, no proof just a message claiming the damage and saying shame on you. Not only was their message condescending their claim was not backed up with any proof they just arbitrarily kept what they wanted. AND they have a perfectly good iPad to resell. I am escalating my complaint through eBay until I get satisfaction they screwed me but have great promise. But don't EVER buy anything you may have a chance of returning they will nick you 50% at the least.VERY POOR customer service

Review.Titre: Give the different price after ship
Review.Contenu: It is give another price lower after shipped. Customer service won't solve your problem and won't reply to you
Please consider another buyer. These guys received my phone over a month ago, and I still haven't been paid!!!
Been 10Days since the email was that my checking on the way and I still haven’t gotten it.
Very unhappy! Still haven't received my payment atall 1 1/2 weeks later...

Review.Titre: Rude and appears to be false advertising
Review.Contenu: I sent my iPhone 7 off on December 9th. They received it today December 18th at 10:35 in the morning. I saw no activity or updates to the status of my transaction when I logged into their website in the afternoon so I called the phone number listed. A man answered the phone and didn’t introduce himself and asked what I needed. I asked him if they received my phone and he replied yes without asking for any of my information. No order number, tracking number, or even my name. I asked him if he was sure and he answered yes sounding very irritated at me and very rushed and simply hung up the phone while I was in mid sentence. I called back and didn’t get an answer. I did eventually get a confirmation email at the end of the day that said that they had received it and it typically takes 1-2 business days to process and pay. This directly conflicts with their advertising that says they pay the same day that the device is received. It simply doesn’t happen. They had all day and were extremely rude when I called. I marked my phone under “poor” condition because the screen is cracked-not shattered- and works perfectly fine. That is their definition of the condition of “poor”. It’s essentailly a new phone with a cracked screen. I am prepared to change my review if they remedy all of this tomorrow. All I expect is for them to just pay me. Otherwise I will be filing a complaint with the BBB link that’s listed on their website for herendous customer service and frankly false advertising. We shall see.
Sold my mini iPad to your company it was flawless. Very satisfied

Every time I've submitted I've gotten a low-ball return offer. This last time I decided to accept it.I was under the impression that the evaluation would take place quickly - it took a few days (edited out 'more than a week' in original review). Then I was told on 1-13 my payment was "on its way". It's now 22 January and I'm only 2 states away... nothing yet.Sent two phones in one box. Only got an eval on one of them... and it was 'low ball'. I guess they kept the other one (was only expecting about $10 for that one anyway).Will raise to 3 stars if I ever get paid.After their reply:Now I'm being dishonest? Wow - you guys really know how to do customer service! Screen was NOT broken when I sent it. They found a problem and offered a lower price (This has happened EVERY time I've dealt with them and previously had them send the phone back. Last time it was a new in the box, never-used phone. They said it was locked - it was not - I have AT&T and sold it to an individual who put it immediately on T-Mobile without 'unlocking'.) This time I accepted the lower price and was told QUOTE: you will receive the check in the mail within 3-7 days UNQUOTE. 9 days later, nothing and I'm berated because I didn't shoose Pay-Pal? And they STILL have a second phone that was sent with their printed shipping label in the same box as the order they claim to have sent a check for - and they haven't even sent an offer on yet -#11102. Again, ALL I can say is Wow. I don't have to wish bad things to you guys - you're bringing it on yourselves. So... in light of the nasty rebuttal, I'm willing to change this to Two Stars if/when I ever get paid. And I sure would like an offer or my other phone back.
My phone was mint. No damage, original box, and they shorted me.

Review.Titre: Did not tell me to include the band
Review.Contenu: Did not tell me to include the band, and they decided to take $10 away from my pay out… nobody ever wants the old dusty band come on now, lied about pay out in 24 hours took 3 days

Review.Titre: ITS NEED MORE WORKING HARD FOR UPDATES

Review.Contenu: The reason why is because online it gave me a totally different price then what they offered. Why give me one set price and then change it? My device was like new.
Shipped my iPhone over a week ago and no payment. Reached out to customer service twice with no reply. Will update review if or when I finally get my check.
Everything worked fine with the phone until I sent it in then you tell me the digitizers was bad do not understand.   expected more cash.

Review.Titre: They will pay you less than what they said
Review.Contenu: I sold iPad mini and they decrease the offer %40 . So, sell your iphone and ipad  to another websites

Review.Titre: I wasn’t empressed with there service
Review.Contenu: I wasn’t empressed with there service when I sent them my iPhone they emailed me that it was reported lost or stolen I told them it had to be a computer glitch  so I called Verizon as soon as they notified me they said that it wasn’t reported lost or stole so they reset the device on there end & said it was clear. I then emailed Klymen that Verizon said the phone was clear & I also emailed them screen shots of my device from the imei check data base & I showed them where it did say it was lost or stolen & after Verizon fixed it it said it was clear.Then they emailed me saying that it was saying clear on Verizon end but not at AT&T. They wouldn’t buy it until AT&T said it was clear witch AT&T shouldn’t have anything to do with a Verizon phone if Verizon says it clear then it’s clear. I then went to AT&T to check it for myself & there system said it was down couldn’t be checked so I emailed them saying that AT&T was giving a systems down error & how was my device checked as not clear when there system was down. Then next day I emailed them saying that AT&T has it cleared. So yes they are right about it taking awhile for them to clear my device but that was on them Verizon had it fixed the same day as I called them & they new it was cleared threw Verizon but they made me wait until AT&T fixed they system to clear it & that’s the part I wasn’t happy about all the waiting
Took a week but received.
See above captioned title.

Review.Titre: You get the most from your trade ins…
Review.Contenu: You get the most from your trade ins here. I am unsure what that say checks being sent take 3-7 days not sure if that includes or excludes weekends?

Review.Titre: Experience Was Easy, Payment Wasn't Exact What Was Stated On The Site.
Review.Contenu: The experience was pretty easy to do, shipping label  was sent pretty quick with exact instructions. I sold a brand new still in the box Apple Series 8 watch and on the site it stated if it was still in the box with all the materials I would receive an additional $10.00. I didn't receive that additional amount.

Review.Titre: Great company, needs more informative website
Review.Contenu: Honestly, the only complaint I have is the lack of detail on the website. It’s very much a I’m putting my phone in a box and shipping it and hoping for the best kind of situation. However, the whole process took about 2 weeks and I’ve been paid with no questions asked. I will most definitely be using them again!

Review.Titre: I didn’t get my money sent to me as…
Review.Contenu: I didn’t get my money sent to me as promised from their website. I states they provide payment the day they receive your phone. I didn’t receive payment until the next business day. Phone received on September 29th payment sent out September 30th. Maybe they should take the we promise to pay you the same day we receive your device off the website
Great value and communication

Review.Titre: Service was great and pretty quick took…
Review.Contenu: Service was great and pretty quick took about 3 days from drop off to receiving the money. Highly recommend. I wish there is a way to track the process though.

Review.Titre: It was a fast and pleasant transaction
Klymen gave me the most money for my…
Review.Contenu: Klymen gave me the most money for my phone than any other site! They sent me all the information that I needed, including a box, to return my phone, and credited my PayPal account as soon as they received it. The only  problem that I had was a few minor glitches when signing up on their website. I would definitely use them again!

Good service, with quick shipping.  The check took a lot longer to arrive than the outgoing tech, but it did arrive (haven't cashed it yet, though, so we will see...).  The only complaint:  Once I chose my item to sell on the website, I was unable to change a small detail (cellular vs wifi only capabilities) without redoing the entire process.

Review.Titre: Fast turnaround and prompt customer service
Review.Contenu: I was spectical of using a on line company to sell my phone but I am impressed with this company. Still waiting on payment by mail and going on 6th business day. Hopefully it will be in the mail tomorrow. Other than payment may be slow in mail, experience was good. When you call them, someone answers promptly and actually assist you. Would recommend to people.

Ipad mini wifi which I thought was in excellent condition had a bright spot in the screen and was dowgraded to poor.  The bright spot was there, but not on the apps I normally used, so the defect was real.  Payment on the poor device was timely and consistent with renegotiated agreement.

Review.Titre: Our first check didn't arrive on time
Review.Contenu: Our first check didn't arrive on time, so about a week after the outside due date, I phoned Klymen and got very understanding treatment.  Explaining that the check had been sent to Fort Mill, SC, instead of Tega Cay, the customer service rep said they would send out another check, which arrived without mishap for the amount I had originally expected for my iPad Mini.  Afterwards the original check - correctly addressed and postmarked two weeks earlier - finally arrived.  No, we didn't cash it, but I'd gladly give Klymen their fifth star if they told us we could.

Not sure cause either Verizon had sold me the wrong iPad or this company tried getting out of paying the full amount of its worth . Pretty sure it was not Verizon fault . But other then that they give pretty much top dollar compare to other company's .

Selling my IPhone 6 Plus was very easy.  The forms were easy to fill out.  Shipping forms were included and all we had to do was drop the package off at UPS.  Less than a week later the payment for my phone was deposited to PayPal in a timely fashion.

Klymen was great! My only complaint is they say that they will match a higher offer on their website, but when I sent an email with a higher offer, they said no. $50 difference in my case. In the end, the pros outweighed the cons.

I would have given 5 stars but they gave my payment 1 day late and I had to call them to confirm and then emailed later . This would have been less hassle free and quick experience. But they gave me what they quoted .

I was nervous to send in an iPhone blindly to a company I hadn't heard about before, but I'm so thankful I did! They were very efficient and great at communicating each step of the process. I got my check in about 4 days!

Review.Titre: The best to sell your electronics
Review.Contenu: I came across this company while typing to sell 2 iPhone 6 Plus and I will not use other company to do business again. I send them the iPhones on a Thursday and by next week Monday my check was on my mailbox they're amazing

This has worked out very well for me.  Klymen offerred more $$ for my Iphone 7 Plus than my phone service provider or other buy-back companies offerred.  Their service is quick and easy.  Payment posted to my paypal account the same morning they approved the purchase.My only complaint is when I first sent my phone in I thought it was unlocked, but it turned out not to be.  They promptly returned my phone so I could unlock it myself since I would net more $$ in the end.  When I sent in the phone originally I included my ear phones and recharge plug, but they weren’t returned with the phone.  They didn’t explain what happened to them but only replied that they don’t buy the accessories.  I guess they got tossed in the trash.  When I mailed the phone to them after unlocking it things worked seamlessly.
I was pleased with the communication regarding my device. I received emails when the device was received and when the check was mailed. I would use them again.
I sent the package on a monday oct 31, it said they received it on the 7th of November and still no money has been in my paypal please help!!!

Review.Titre: Price received for a brand new Galaxy S4 Edge
Review.Contenu: Price received for a brand new, never opened Samsung s7 edge was I thought low, but the best I could find. Process was extremely easy.
Great system-fast and accurate. If you use PayPal you may have to wait 5-7 days to access the funds. I plan to use them again soon.

Review.Titre: Good with everything got paid next day…
Review.Contenu: Good with everything got paid next day too

Review.Titre: Good business not in happy at all just…
Review.Contenu: Good business not in happy at all just took longer then I thought with payment but everything else was 100% on point

Review.Titre: Stayed with it until my devices were…
Review.Contenu: Stayed with it until my devices were removed from the cloud, and then immediately paid my original quote.

Review.Titre: Phone categories didn't really cover my situation
Review.Contenu: I'm a little unhappy about the money you paid given the condition of the phone. Otherwise five stars.
Fast payment. a little less than what was advertised, but it was understandable.

Review.Titre: This were my first time trying this…
Review.Contenu: This were my first time trying this company out and it were Okay. Not bad.
I haven't had any issues getting a prompt payment. These guys are quick.
Great team at Klymen - fast turnaround and better value than most others
Professional and answered my questions regarding trusting their site.
Nothing has been deposited in the account I have attached to my Pay Pal
No issues, check took a little over a week to receive.
Highest quote and speedy payment!!!
Seamless transaction. Fair price.
Very easy transaction
Extremely fast payout. Precisely what the estimated quote was online too. I’ve been dealing with Klymen for years and he’s never let me down. A+!!!!!

Review.Titre: Quick pay same day highly recommended

Review.Contenu: Great experience! I felt like they kept me in the loop for the whole transaction.

Review.Titre: Same day payment & was $10 more than…
Review.Contenu: Same day payment & was $10 more than what was quoted!
Easy peasy sale. Easy instructions to follow for shipping the product. Payment was transacted quickly after Klymen’s received my package. I’d do business with them again.
A very straight forward process and the best price. I trade my iPhone and Apple Watch in every year when the new models come out so when late 2024 rolls around, Klymen will be my first stop.

Review.Titre: Easy and fast payout thank you
Process was super easy and I received…
Review.Contenu: Process was super easy and I received payment the same day that my iPad was delivered to Klyman! I had shopped around a bit, thought about selling on my own, and ultimately decided to go with Klyman because they gave the best price. Would definitely do business with this company again in the future!

Review.Titre: What made my experience great was the…
Review.Contenu: What made my experience great was the same day they received my item they gave me tips on how to unlock it and I got paid that same night. Awesomeness through and through would recommend them to all my friends

Review.Titre: Stop looking so go with Klyman!
Review.Contenu: Checked out about a dozen websites that buy phones. Decided to go with Klyman.com based on reviews and payout amounts for my two phones. I am glad I did. Super smooth and fast process. Everything was as described and they met all timeframes. Stop looking to go with Klyman!

I found out about Klymen when it came up as a result from a Google search. I had never heard of it before, and I found that they offered good value for several devices. I was skeptical, but I decided to trust using the company based on an A+ rating from the Better Business Bureau as well as tons of positive Trustpilot reviews.I sent in my device, and I received a confirmation email from Klymen within one hour of when the package was delivered. The email stated that it normally takes 1-2 business days for processing and payment. I got paid hours later on the same day for the exact amount that my quote was for. I will definitely be using Klymen again, and recommend it to other people. Thank you!

Klymen is awesome! This was my first time using them and I was skeptical of it at first because they offered so much higher than competitors, however they paid the agreed amount in less than 24 hours via PayPal of receiving the two brand new iPhones I sent out. Will be returning for sure!

Company is 100% legit & deserves a checkmark for integrity ✅ in my book. They honored the quoted offer because I described my device correctly. They have software that runs diagnostics on each device that tells a lot more about your device than the questionnaire you fill out can. I attached a pic from paypal to show they are a genuine and reputable company. I got paid within 1 day of them receiving my device.

Review.Titre: They are what they say..fast ,simple offering highest $ hands down
Review.Contenu: They offer 50+ dollars more on any late model iphones than any other buyback online , I did numerous searches with a couple different search engine and will soon be sending them my fourth phone I know sending something of value to a stranger without any protection no payments held in an escrow makes us all uneasy I even called them before I sent the first one. Even after I did my online checkup to verify the legitimacy. So take my word you have no reason to worry with these guys
I have used Klymen a few times now and they never disappoint.  The agreed upon price was honored and delivered in a timely fashion.  I highly recommend using them.

Great service, website tells u how much you'll get? They send u the prepaid box to send ur device in. U pay nothin out of pocket. They were the highest paying website I found. From filling out the forms to getting paid on PayPal, it took less than a week, including a Sunday. Would have been even faster if I remembered to log out of my Icloud account. But they sent me an email telling me how to do it online. They didn't have to mail my device back. Only issue was trying to talk on the phone. This was my first time using them so I wanted to ensure I wasnt being scammed or anything. The person I spoke with, needs to practice his business phone etiquette a little better. Felt like he was trying to just get u off the phone asap. But now I know they are legit and they pay what was agreed upon on the website, expeditiously. I would definately recommend.
3rd transaction with this company. Prompt payment, just as agreed upon. Very happy with our interactions and will use again in the future and recommend. Never using eBay to sell electronics again!

Review.Titre: Quick process from start to finish!
Review.Contenu: Easy to complete the process. The phones I sent in were looked at the same day they were received. Received the funds the same day too!
Thank you ! 5 star. Multiple sales always great no tricks or surprises. Prompt payments based on assessments.

Review.Titre: DON’T GIVE UP TRYING TO SELL AN ELECTRONIC, CALL KLYMEN
Review.Contenu: I had been trying to sell my APPLE AIR 2nd GEN.to a couple of on-line buyers,established stores not individuals. One I had used in the past. They either did not reply to my information they requested or they offered a low cash offer. My iPad was in very good condition and one of these businesses had purchased from me in the past. Their offers were low. I was going to give up but decided to try KLYMEN and sent them my iPad for their inspection after they expressed an interest when they received my description of my iPad.  The process was clear,easy to complete and stringent shipping guidance given. I followed their requests and within 2 business days my iPad was bough at a higher amount than any of the 3 other buyers I had contacted.If I ever have to sell another item I will go to KLYMEN first.

I’ve used this company many times and it is really the only one I trust. The pay out is always fair (usually more than anyone else is offering) and you get paid very quickly. This is definitely a 5 star operation.

Review.Titre: Fantastic experience selling my iPhone 12 Pro Max
Review.Contenu: Klymen offered $50 more than any of the competitors in the market. They communicated with me at each step and deposited my payment into my PayPal account as soon as my phone was received. Great company to deal with!

Smooth easy transaction, they are based in NY so to anyone saying they are rude they are not they are just very busy and can't stay on the phone very long.Got the full payment I was offered for my iPhone 14 pro max

Have been doing business with them for the last couple of weeks and it’s been nothing but outstanding transactions with them, quick response and feedback and accuracy in every transaction, sticking with them forever Eric

Awesome experience! I first Sent my phones off to sell to another well know company who greatly reduced the value of my phones once they received them. Had them send my phones back to me and sold them to Klymen. Klymen kept there word on the purchase price and were awesome to deal with. Very quick payment and kept in communication with me the whole time. Wish I had more things to sell them. What an honest great companyCraig
TRUSTED SERVICE!…. The quote I got was what I was paid SAME DAY(via PayPal)… Would recommend to everyone who’s looking to sell the devices. Returning customer for sure. Klymen is great!
Best price. Ease of ordering shipping container & label. Quick turn around & transfer of payment.

Great service. I forgot to remove the access to cloud account.  They sent the phone back with the steps to correct the problem, and a return shipping label. Once back, it wad progressed and a check was in the mail.  I am telling friend about Klymen and the beat every other bid I received
Very, smooth and easy transaction. Paid top dollar above all competitors. Communicated every step of the way. Highly recommended and trusted.

Review.Titre: It was a super quick experience!
Review.Contenu: It was a super quick experience. I got my box, sent it in, and a few days later I got my payment. I appreciate the support for it as well!
Another transaction with Klymen with excellent, prompt service. I have found no one better thank Klymen!! Need to sell your iPhone? Klymen should be your first contact!!

I got a shipping label immediately after accepting my quote. I shipped it on 2/21/22 and they received it 2/23/22.  Later that night payment was posted in my PayPal. I admit I was skeptical but they totally proved legit.  I will definitely be using their services again.  I highly recommend them and they were the best/highest quote I got.  I'll be telling friends and family for sure!

Review.Titre: The ONLY Company I Will Do Business With!
Review.Contenu: I have been selling my devices to Klymen for years. Not only will they pay you more than anyone else, they also pay for the shipping!  Also, I usually get paid within 1 business day.  Even when I mess up (i.e. I somehow left passcode protection on this last time) it was pretty much a non issue. I gave them the passcode and that was that.  They always treat me very fairly and they always pay the quoted price.  There is a reason customers rate them so highly.I highly recommend them!
